descriptionHtml:
Ever felt like the ending of the Dragonborn main quest wasn't enough and left you unsatisfied?
Now you can awaken as Miraak and enslave Solstheim. 


Tutorial/Starting the mod: After you have finished the Dragonborn-Quest a courier will come to you. He delivers a note. After reading it a quest starts. Or you can just go to the Shrine by your self.


Added:
- Improved Dragonaspectshout which can be used several times a day.
- Improved Bend Will Shout
- Improved Miraak Equipment.
- Improved Apocrypha Spells.
- Hermaeus Mora Shrine in Solstheim and a gather point in Apocrypha (for your cultist)
- Player Home in Apocrypha (thanks to kxk)
- Spell which turns any person in the world into a cultist (except essentials and guards)
- More Spells (Conjure High Seeker ... )


In Future:
- Questline to enslave Solstheim
- Miraak Cult
- Hermaeus Mora Cult
- More Spells


Requirements:
Skyrim & Dragonborn


This mod is just in the alpha-phase. So please excuse bugs.
Please report bugs and post suggestions and feedback. 
Thank you and enjoy.

The most updated version will always be on steam:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=293572193
author: MrTheStuhl
